subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Soren Kjeldsen and Paul Lawrie shared the lead at the Andalucia Open in Malaga, Spain, after each shot a five-under 65 in the opening round.
snippet: The defending champion Soren Kjeldsen and Paul Lawrie shared the lead at the Andalucia Open in Malaga, Spain, after each shot a five-under 65 in the opening round.
